        @RequestMapping(value="/login",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String login(java.lang.String name,
                                                                                           java.lang.String email,
                                                                                           java.lang.String token,
                                                                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        Register/Login a user.
        Parameters:
        name - User's name
        email - User's email
        token - Google OAuth id_token
        session - HttpSession for the request. Required to check that the user is authenticated.
        Returns:
        Redirect to search page after login.
